Traits.Name: Shelter
Traits.Description: Adjacent allies get +1 accuracy on saves.

Traits.Name: Command Aura
Traits.Description: Allies in range 3 have +1 boon on attacks.

Traits.Name: Tactics Aura
Traits.Description: Staggered, winded, dazed, or stunned foes in range 3 are also vulnerable.

Interrupts.Name: Counter Strike
Interrupts.Description: The commander or an ally in range 3 gains evasion against an incoming physical attack.

Actions.Name: Autocure
Actions.Description: May grant vigor 1 to a bloodied ally in range 3.

Actions.Name: Leader's Strike
Actions.Hit: Deal light damage and an ally in range 3 can dash 2 spaces.

Actions.Name: Commander's Mark
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 must save or become marked. While marked, they lose and cannot gain stealth, and attacks against them gain true strike. They can repeat this save at the end of their turns to end this effect.

Actions.Name: Forced March
Actions.Description: When Commander takes this stance, and at start of each of the commanderâ€™s turns, the commander and all allies in range 3 can dash 2 in the same direction.
